title: Audit Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Program
description: For a financial institution, a compliance auditor tests the AML program.

tasks.description: Review the transaction monitoring system's rules to ensure they are designed to detect suspicious activity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms the rules are comprehensive.

tasks.description: Select a sample of alerts generated by the monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A sample of alerts is chosen for review.

tasks.description: For the sampled alerts, review the investigation file to ensure each alert was properly investigated and a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) was filed if necessary.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds one alert that was closed without adequate investigation and documentation.
